column2: We have recently reorganized our intelligence and security services, resulting in a bit of administrative chaos.
Our Intelligence and Security Apparatus is focused on domestic intelligence and internal security.
Our Intelligence and Security Apparatus is focused on foreign intelligence and international affairs.
Our Intelligence and Security Apparatus is focused on military intelligence and national defense.
Our Intelligence and Security Apparatus is strongly politicized, and acts as an extension of the ruling party.
Our Intelligence and Security Apparatus has a minimal scope and reach.
Liberty and social justice for all.
Social democracy is nothing but an unstable contradiction.
Labor is the superior of capital.
What is socialism but the equal distribution of misery?
Reality has a liberal bias, after all.
Liberalism is nothing more than unprincipled opportunism.
The freer the markets, the freer the people.
This land is your land, this land is our land.
Missing the jobs, prosperity, and progress for the trees.
A Conservative is just a Liberal who's been mugged.
Nothing wrong with loving your country!
We cannot let arbitrary lines divide us.
Things were better back in the day.
We can't live in the past forever.
There is a world beyond our borders, you know?
